topics.body:
So my cat Zack is doing much better; the wound isn't infected because we've been cleaning it out and such.  For those of you that don't remember or heard, my cat got bit by a dog and it left a huge hole in his skin.  The wound is going to take easily a month or more until it's fully healed, but he is doing much better.

Also the reason why I thought about sharing this is that he's sitting next to me and I realized something funny; he's a total tsunadere.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54d5a86263687259b4fe2200#post_54d5a86263687259b4fe2200
You never told us you have a cat. Nice!
Also, glad he is recovering. That must have been a nasty ordeal he had to go through. Just hope he isn't traumatized from this.

Was it your neighbour's dog?
